Red Riding Hood like never before....

Dr.Riding Hood (noted particle physicist) and her team are on the cusp of a new era in clean energy. Their Antimatter Reactor will brighten the world's future and usher in a clean, sustainable energy source to the world's power suppliers.

One night, when Dr.Riding Hood is working late, an anomaly in the algorithm causes a particle blast that sends Dr.Riding Hood through time and space. She, now lost and timeless, must find her way back home.

FEATURES:

YOU ARE IN FULL CONTROL
>Intuitive 60/40 split controls give an awesome platformer controls experience
>Use the left 60% of the screen for movement, right 40% to jump and onscreen buttons for actions

PLAY ON ANYSCREEN
>Whaleo Anyscreen* allows iPhone users to play the game on almost ANY DEVICE that is fully HTML5 compatible
>Start playing on your iPhone than switch to your computer (i.e. iMac) in seconds

>Amazing new story of Red Riding Hood
>Game Center achievements

A TRUE CHALLENGE
>Gorgeous level design
>Learn to use patience to your advantage
>Each level presents challenging puzzles that will keep you on your feet

AN AUDIO EXPERIENCE
>Beautiful, original, compelling soundtrack

USEFUL SURROUNDINGS
